name: Legends of War
summary: Legends of War revolutionizes console strategy gaming, mixing turn-based tactics with action elements in a visually stunning setting. Assume the role of one of the most charismatic generals of World War II, General George S. Patton, Commander of the U.S. Third Army. Lead your troops as they battle their way from the blood soaked beaches of Normandy to the war torn streets of Berlin. Carefully plan your moves and make the right decisions to dominate the battlefield and lead your men to victory.
